pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pedigree, Genetic Merit and Phenotype Simulation // Simulate pedigree, genetic merits and phenotypes with random mating followed by (non)random selection with different patterns for males and females. Bijma, P. Rutten, M. (2002) https://pdfs.se manticscholar.org/ac22/e2961cc7797a121d956abd1ecbaddc017f87.pdf .
